<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
OENO: The warp towers' rotating doors have been reported opening and closing on their own, without input from any Nomai.
2
1
OENO: After closer study, I can confidently conclude that the phenomenon is not caused by any structural defect in the doors, but by the sunless day.
3 2
OENO: As the <color=lightblue>Hourglass Twins</color> orbit around each other, they become aligned along a straight line with the sun at regular intervals, causing the sunless day on the twin farther from the sun.
4
3
OENO: The twin farther from the sun feels not only the sun's great gravity - but also gravity from the twin closer to the sun, pulling it in the same direction.
5
4
OENO: These combined gravitational forces cause an extraordinarily strong pull of gravity, pulling on the vision orbs as the alignment passes overhead and causing the doors to activate.
6
5
OENO: The same force is also what causes sand to be pulled towards the other twin at the alignment point, creating the funnel of sand.
7
6
YARROW: My deepest thanks for your hard work in investigating this issue, Oeno! I am sure Bur will be relieved to hear your findings.
8
2
OENO: Normally, Ember Twin's gravity alone should not be enough to cause these vision orbs to activate. However, when combined with the gravity of the sun, the outcome changes.
